featured.text: A gas leak one month later caused an explosion in the lights, injuring the policeman operating it.

definition.zh_def: 氣體，通常指無形的物質，能夠填充其容器並具有可變形狀和體積。
definition.en_def: A substance in a state of matter that has no fixed shape and can expand to fill any space.
definition.example: The gas in the balloon expanded when it was heated.
